rbranding

Source: vignettes/rbranding.Rmd
rbranding.Rmd

#Get started on your Shiny app with rbranding:

In the R console:

Install the package from github (if necessary):

#In the r terminal:
#Install the package from github (if necessary):
>devtools::install_github("rbranding/rbranding")
#load the library:
>library(rbranding)

#Initialize the rbranding package:
>rbranding::init_rbranding()

#get the latest version of the _brand.yml file:
>rbranding::get_brand()

#install the example1 template:
>rbranding::get_template("example1")

Developed by Willy Ray, Andrew Pulsipher, Centers for Disease Control and Prevention’s Center for Forecasting and Outbreak Analytics.
